title: 官方核心If you wish to use IP forwarding.please enable it in you BungeeCord...
txt_content:
官方核心mcserver   If you wish to use IP forwarding.please enable it in you BungeeCord...
怎么办  求解

replies.author: 恋
replies.txt_content:
请确保子服和BC配置里面的端口正确 如果还不行把BC配置文件中的
ip_forward:  一项改为false

replies.author: s1563231393
replies.txt_content:
在bungeecord config文件里修改
bind_local_address: false
试一试

replies.author: GiNYAi
replies.txt_content:
spigot.yml
中把bc支持关掉  大概
